name: Sunnyside Elementary ExCel Program
description: Location: Sunnyside Elementary School 250 Foerster Street, San Francisco, CA 94112 PROGRAM INFORMATION GRADES participating: Entering Kindergarten-5th grades. - BEFORE SCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 8:00am-9:15am - AFTERSCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 3:30 pm-6:30 pm REGISTER QUESTIONS? Please contact Sam Molina, Site Coordinator, 415-689-9577, smolina@ymcasf.org or Tiffany Andrade, Family Events Coordinator, 650-489-6039, tandrade@ymcasf.org
